welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sheffield Lake! Known for its beautiful lakefront and charming community, we are excited to have you here. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Hopkins International Airport serves domestic flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Hopkins International Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Hopkins International Airport serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
